Articles.Content:
Walking spaceplane "Kerbinprimes"

I have to say, this is not a replica.

It is possible to arrange a party for 56 kerbals orbit Kerbin or when flying past the Mun.

When injection into orbit, watch traction engines and turn off in time, starting with the outermost.

Features:

Version KSP - 0.25.0

Crew - 2 kerbals;

Passengers - 56;

Number of pieces - 297;

Weight - 66.3t;

Fuel Capacity:

Fuel - 2280;

Oxidizer - 1320;

The quantity of atmospheric engines - 5;

The quantity of nuclear propulsion engines - 2 (clipped in turbojet to the gondola);

DeltaV in orbit 125x125km - 1500-1550m/s.

Control:

3 - Ladder;

6 - Turn on/off turbojet in the gondola;

7 - Turn on/off turbojet in the center on sides;

8 - Turn on/off turbojet in the center;

9 - Turn on/off intake;

0 - Turn on/off nuclear engine.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download

This is fantastic!

I have been trying to build a star trek ship for ages with no luck. Do you think it could be made to VTOL too? That would be epic.

Either way great work on this matey. Only one more thing left to say, Engage!
Wow this is beautiful. Funny I found this while listening to Magic Carpet Ride
Majorjim, I'm not sure that he will make a normal VTOL, at best, only to take off.

Majorjim, I'm not sure that he will make a normal VTOL, at best, only to take off.

That's cool too, looking at it I just think It would really suit being a VTOL.

Well, you have inspired me. 'Nuff said! :Hurries off to the SPH:

Rune. Jim just put the icing on the idea.

Well, you have inspired me. 'Nuff said! :Hurries off to the SPH:

Rune. Jim just put the icing on the idea.

Eeep! I look forward to seeing what you cone up with!
Rune, will be interesting to see, the more that in version 0.90.0 editor can do better.
That's pretty cool, I like it. I'm guessing it won't play well with FAR? xD
eddiew, you are absolutely right, with FAR will not fly
not sure where the nuclear engines are on that thing, I presume they are somewhere in the hull itself?

Rune, will be interesting to see, the more that in version 0.90.0 editor can do better.

Yup, the new editor really allows you to do magic, compared with earlier versions. Here's a very dark WiP shot with the engineering test article:

Rune. Haven't even run fuel lines, and it's already looking good.
nevermind, I didn't look at the entire gallery
SSI likes this. Can we publish this in our new catalog?
I wasn't a fan of the NX Enterprise, or that entire series, but credit where credit is due! Outstanding work!

It's a worthy pre-TOS design.

No moar words....

SSI likes this. Can we publish this in our new catalog?

Inigma, i do not mind)

- - - Updated - - -

not sure where the nuclear engines are on that thing, I presume they are somewhere in the hull itself?

Sampa, nuclear engines clipped in turbojet to the gondola. On some pictures visible exhaust flame.

How difficult was that for you to build? It must have been quite...
